body:
So as I have been playing Avicus, I have seen that there are many Jr. Mods. I just want to say congrats to them all instead of individually. Good luck with those that apply for staff whenever apps re-open and keep on rocking!

P.S: My new skin xD

title: Congrats Message

replies.body: This is spam, use Skype or an alternative messaging system to congratulate them.
